name: Next Tab (FX Extention) - Iconize ContextMenu Item
description: Adds a narrow green arrow to the Next Tab (Firefox add-on) context menu item, which makes it easier to find this item in the right click context menu.
css:
/*
>> Title: Next Tab - Iconize ContextMenu Item
>> Created by Alirezaaa
>> www.TARFANDESTAN.com | username: arsenal-champion
*/


#nexttab-open .menu-iconic-left
{background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat !important;}
